TensorFlow Lite Task Library's core module.


This module contains classes used across multiple tasks in the Task Library.

## Classes

[`class BaseOptions`](../../tflite_support/task/core/BaseOptions): Base options for TensorFlow Lite Task Library's Python APIs.
